subject: download Adobe Dreamweaver CS3
body:
When God measures man, He puts the tape around his heart -- not his head.

The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge, but fools despise wisdom and instruction. [King Solomon]

Though intelligence is powerless to modify character, it is a dab hand at finding euphemisms for its weaknesses.

I hope with all my heart there will be painting in heaven.

Jealousy is love bed of burning snarl.

Woman's first duty in life is to her dressmaker. What the second duty is no one has yet discovered.

Old friends are best. King James used to call for his old shoes they were easiest for his feet.

For neither man nor angel can discern hypocrisy, the only evil that walks invisible, except to God alone.

Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.

Big results require big ambitions.

Failure is not the worst thing in the world -- the very worst is not to try

Communication is not only the essence of being human, but also a vital property of life.

All evils are equal when they are extreme.
